name: • Notify that set-out is complete, principal may inspect set out prior to authorising release of HP.
• Surface Area and around it to be dry and free of dirt
• Existing markings material is flaking or chipping, proposed surface prep method agreement to be obtained from Principal
• Prepare the marking or surface suitably before applying the pavement marking material when material to be applied may be incompatible
• Where practical apply permanent pavement marking on asphalt wearing course surfaces only after 7 days. It is not intended that we can comply as linemarking must be replaced same shift for safety.
• Strictly in accordance with the manufacturers’ instructions and guidelines
• Apply all longitudinal lines using a self propelled machine, unless otherwise approved by the Principal.
5 - Reinstatement of linemarking after road works
• Temporary RPMs can be used for up to 10 days after opening to traffic after which permanent pavement markings must be reinstated.
QA ENGINEER / SPE / PE SIGN OFF
